title: Coaxial nickel cobalt selenide/nitrogen-doped carbon nanotube array as a three-dimensional self-supported electrode for electrochemical energy storage
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,7710-7719
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA08635F, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Chen Zhang, Shang Wang, Junwu Xiao
An energy storage device with a voltage window of 1.6 V is developed using three-dimensional coaxial array electrodes, and exports a volumetric energy density of 4.9 mW h cm−3 at 4 mA cm−2.
